name: Ade

attributes.attribute: does not become the lover of queen Guinevere

sources: Monaghan, Patricia. The Encyclopedia of Celtic Mythology and Folklore. Checkmark Books, 2008.
text: An Arthurian heroine named Ade is mentioned in certain texts as the second spouse of the knight of the Round Table, Lancelot. The texts depict an unnamed first wife prior to her. This portrayal indicates that Lancelot does not engage in a romantic relationship with queen Guinevere.
